name: Link between Souls
description:
Heinz is cursed to be bound to all evil souls in this kingdom. To free himself he must defeat all wicked beings.

But watch out, Heinz, as the soul link will force all to follow your steps.

On his way he encounters strong knights and mighty mages while he only wields a small sword.

How to Play:

UP = Move forward in the direction the character is facing
RIGHT = Rotate clockwise
LEFT = Rotate counter-clockwise
DOWN = Turn around

ESCAPE = Return to the Village (disabled in tutorials)
